Package cryptoAnalyzer.selection

Class SelectStartDate

java.lang.Object
cryptoAnalyzer.selection.SelectionObserver
cryptoAnalyzer.selection.SelectStartDate
public class SelectStartDate
extends SelectionObserver
Inherit SelectionObserver class, use Observer Design Pattern This method implements the function that user select a start date after they choose the type of cryptocurrency to analyze.
Since:
2021-12-03
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ruyi Jin
